meanings.sent1: The seashell was shellier than the rock.
meanings.sent2: Her voice was shellier than the sound of the waves.
meanings.sent3: The crab felt jealous of the shellier hermit crab next door.
meanings.sent4: The sky grew shellier as the storm approached.
meanings.sent5: The shellier sand felt rough underfoot.

meanings.sent1: The shellier eggs were carefully collected by the children.
meanings.sent2: The shellier armor provided better protection in battle.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a shellier nut and danced with joy.
meanings.sent4: The shellier walls of the castle echoed with history.
meanings.sent5: The shellier leaves rustled in the wind.
